settings.heading: Explore our Haldiram Khaas Premium Bundles
settings.content: Indulge in the artistry of Haldiram's UK Khaas Collection. Every treat is a masterpiece, crafted with premium ingredients. Elevate your celebrations with this exquisite gifting option.
Premium ingredients used, such as saffron, pistachio, and hazelnut. Include visuals and brief stories about sourcing these ingredients

settings.description: Each box in Haldiram's Khaas Collection is a taste of pure indulgence, crafted with premium ingredients and a touch of tradition, offering a luxurious experience in every bite.
